session.objective: Implement three P0 quality gate issues (#934, #935, #936) from v0.3.0 milestone

commitChanges.notes: All changes committed including quoting fix from PR review

updateMemory.notes: Session context captured in session log

tasks.title: Add commit counter to orchestrator prompt

outcomes: Created Validate-PRReadiness.ps1 with 5 checks: commit count, file count, additions, synthesis verdicts, ADR compliance
SESSION-PROTOCOL.md updated with Session Mid Protocol and Phase 2.7 pre-PR validation gate
Orchestrator and implementer agents now have Commit Discipline sections with 3-tier thresholds
PROJECT-CONSTRAINTS.md extended with PR Scope Constraints

decisions.decision: Used PowerShell for Validate-PRReadiness.ps1 despite ADR-042 Python-first preference
decisions.rationale: Issue #934 specifies PowerShell; entire validation ecosystem (Validate-PrePR.ps1, Pester tests) is PowerShell

decisions.decision: Used parallel agent team (3 implementers) for independent tasks
decisions.rationale: Issues #934, #935, #936 have no shared files and can be safely parallelized

decisions.decision: Moved test to tests/ directory instead of scripts/tests/
decisions.rationale: Project convention places Pester tests in tests/ directory
